org.agreement_technologies.common.map_heuristic

Interface Heuristic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DTGHeuristic, FFHeuristic, LandmarksHeuristic

    public interface Heuristic
    Heuristic interface provides the necessary methods to compute heuristic values.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int INFINITE 
      static int INFO_LANDMARKS

    • Method Detail

      • evaluatePlan

        void evaluatePlan(HPlan p,
                int threadIndex)
        Heuristic evaluation of a plan. The resulting value is stored inside the plan (see setH method in Plan interface).
        Parameters:
        p - Plan to evaluate
        threadIndex - Thread index, for multi-threading purposes
        Since:
        1.0

      • evaluatePlan

        void evaluatePlan(HPlan p,
                int threadIndex,
                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> achievedLandmarks)
        Multi-heuristic evaluation of a plan, also evaluates the remaining landmarks to achieve. The resulting value is stored inside the plan (see setH method in Plan interface).
        Parameters:
        p - Plan to evaluate
        threadIndex - Thread index, for multi-threading purposes
        achievedLandmarks - List of already achieved landmarks
        Since:
        1.0

      • evaluatePlanPrivacy

        void evaluatePlanPrivacy(HPlan p,
                       int threadIndex)
        Heuristically evaluates the cost of reaching the agent's private goals.
        Parameters:
        p - Plan to evaluate
        threadIndex - Thread index, for multi-threading purposes
        Since:
        1.0

      • waitEndEvaluation

        void waitEndEvaluation()
        Synchronization step after the distributed heuristic evaluation.
        Since:
        1.0

      • startEvaluation

        void startEvaluation(HPlan basePlan)
        Begining of the heuristic evaluation stage.
        Parameters:
        basePlan - Base plan, whose successors will be evaluated
        Since:
        1.0

      • getInformation

        java.lang.Object getInformation(int infoFlag)
        Gets information about a given topic.
        Parameters:
        infoFlag - Topic to get information about. In this version, only landmarks information (see INFO_LANDMARKS constant) is available
        Returns:
        Object with the requested information
        Since:
        1.0

      • supportsMultiThreading

        boolean supportsMultiThreading()
        Checks if the current heuristic evaluator supports multi-threading.
        Returns:
        true, if multi-therading evaluation is available. false, otherwise
        Since:
        1.0

      • requiresHLandStage

        boolean requiresHLandStage()
        Checks if the current heuristic evaluator requieres an additional stage for landmarks evaluation.
        Returns:
        true, if a landmarks evaluation stage is required. false, otherwise
        Since:
        1.0

      • numGlobalLandmarks

        int numGlobalLandmarks()
        Returns the total number of global (public) landmarks.
        Returns:
        Total number of global (public) landmarks
        Since:
        1.0

      • checkNewLandmarks

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> checkNewLandmarks(HPlan plan,
                                                       java.util.BitSet achievedLandmarks)
        Returns the new landmarks achieved in this plan.
        Parameters:
        plan - Plan to check
        achievedLandmarks - Already achieved landmarks
        Returns:
        List of indexes of the new achieved landmarks
        Since:
        1.0
